shri්ra lankawe thanapathiwarun lesa pathwa pamini saya denek eeye (19) udasana araliyagaha mandirayedi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha aktha pathra bara dunha.nepalaya, pranshaya, balgeriyawa, sudan, sarbiyawa, pinlanthaya yana ratawal sandaha mema nawa thanapathiwaru path wi sitithi.nepalaya sandaha sushil chandra amathya, pranshaya sandaha kristin robihon, balgeriyawa sandaha borislow krilow kostaw, sudanaya sandaha kahidir haron ahamad, sarbiyawa sandaha jowan mirilowik ha pinlanthaya sandaha therhi hakala yana nawa thanapathiwaru mese janadhipathiwaraya wetha siya aktha pathra bara dunha.
oba bhawithayata ganna badu bahiradiya nawatha nawatha pawichchiyedi gabada karana sthanaye piliwela pirisudukama pahasuwak gena denne obatamayi.
